name: Mr. Blue Footed Booby
summary: A combination of lucid dreams and thoughts that the director had. A blue being in danger of extinction, a half-man and half-bird called Mr. Blue Footed Booby, will enjoy a funny and surreal dinner.
info:
• 中文名: 蓝脚鲣鸟
  • 上映年度: 2min
  • 片长: 2016
  • 导演: Gino Imagino
  • 编剧: Gino Imagino
  • 制片国家/地区: 厄瓜多尔
